DOC.brief_summary: Real-time comparison three different bedside strokevolumemeasurements ( arterial waveform analysis , eosofageal doppler 2D transthoracal ultrasound ) validate cardiac magnetic resonance imaging ( CMRI )
DOC.brief_title: Real-time Comparison Left Ventricular Strokevolume Measurement Four Different Methods
DOC.detailed_description: 20 healthy volounteers age 20-40 year , previous medical history undergo simoultaneous leave ventrikular strokevolume measurement use three different method rest . After datasampling without move , subject undergo Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging 2D-throughplane cine tecnology validation volume measurement . The data analyze use Bland-Altman calculation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volounteers age 2040 , BMI < 30 , weight < 100 kg , medication , sinus rythm ECG , contraindication MRI , ability give write informed consent . Heart and/or vascular disease angina pectoris , arrythmias , claudicatio intermittens e g. Diseases gastrointestinal tract nose . Coagulopathies Pregnancy Allergys local anaesthetic Claustrofobia
